entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 5 May 2023
